languages.text: "Запрос уже отправлен. Мы ожидаем ответа через пару циклов. Добавим его в дело в качестве дополнительной информации. Сейчас это вам никак не поможет".
"The request has already been sent. We expect a response within a few cycles. We will add it to the file as additional information. It will be of no help to you right now."
languages.original_text: "Запрос уже отправлен. Мы ожидаем ответа через пару циклов. Добавим его в дело в качестве дополнительной информации. Сейчас это вам никак не поможет".

traits.locale_text: "The request has already been sent. We expect a response within a few cycles. We will add it to the file as additional information. It will be of no help to you right now."
"The request has already been sent. We expect a response within a few cycles. We will add it to the file as additional information. It will be of no help to you right now."
"The request has already been sent. We expect a response within a few cycles. We will add it to the file as additional information. It will be of no help to you right now."
"The request has already been sent. We expect a response within a few cycles. We will add it to the file as additional information. It will be of no help to you right now."
"The request has already been sent. We expect a response within a few cycles. We will add it to the file as additional information. It will be of no help to you right now."

languages.text: "Die Anfrage wurde bereits verschickt. Wir rechnen in einigen Zyklen mit einer Antwort. Sie wird der Akte als Zusatzinformation beigefügt. Im Moment kann sie Euch nicht helfen."
languages.original_text: "The request has already been sent. We expect a response within a few cycles. We will add it to the file as additional information. It will be of no help to you right now."

traits.locale_text: "Die Anfrage wurde bereits verschickt. Wir rechnen in einigen Zyklen mit einer Antwort. Sie wird der Akte als Zusatzinformation beigefügt. Im Moment kann sie Euch nicht helfen."

languages.text: « La demande a été envoyée. Nous attendons la réponse dans quelques cycles, et ces informations complémentaires seront versées au dossier. Mais cette requête ne vous sera d'aucune utilité pour l'instant. »
languages.original_text: "The request has already been sent. We expect a response within a few cycles. We will add it to the file as additional information. It will be of no help to you right now."

traits.locale_text: « La demande a été envoyée. Nous attendons la réponse dans quelques cycles, et ces informations complémentaires seront versées au dossier. Mais cette requête ne vous sera d'aucune utilité pour l'instant. »

languages.text: “请求已发出，预计会在几个周期内得到回应，我们会将上述内容作为附加信息添加到卷宗之中。不过，这些信息此时此刻对你没有任何帮助。”
languages.original_text: "The request has already been sent. We expect a response within a few cycles. We will add it to the file as additional information. It will be of no help to you right now."

traits.locale_text: “请求已发出，预计会在几个周期内得到回应，我们会将上述内容作为附加信息添加到卷宗之中。不过，这些信息此时此刻对你没有任何帮助。”

languages.text: «La solicitud ya se ha enviado. Esperamos una respuesta en los próximos ciclos. La añadiremos al archivo del caso como información adicional, pero no le será de ayuda ahora mismo».
languages.original_text: "The request has already been sent. We expect a response within a few cycles. We will add it to the file as additional information. It will be of no help to you right now."

traits.locale_text: «La solicitud ya se ha enviado. Esperamos una respuesta en los próximos ciclos. La añadiremos al archivo del caso como información adicional, pero no le será de ayuda ahora mismo».

languages.text: 「要請はすでに送信済みです。数サイクル以内に返答があると見込んでいます。その情報は補足資料として記録に追加されますが、今のあなたには何の助けにもなりません」
languages.original_text: "The request has already been sent. We expect a response within a few cycles. We will add it to the file as additional information. It will be of no help to you right now."

traits.locale_text: 「要請はすでに送信済みです。数サイクル以内に返答があると見込んでいます。その情報は補足資料として記録に追加されますが、今のあなたには何の助けにもなりません」

languages.text: "Talep çoktan gönderildi. Birkaç döngü içinde yanıt bekliyoruz. Onu da dava dosyasında ek bilgi olarak bulunduracağız. Şu noktada sana bir faydası dokunmaz."
languages.original_text: "The request has already been sent. We expect a response within a few cycles. We will add it to the file as additional information. It will be of no help to you right now."

traits.locale_text: "Talep çoktan gönderildi. Birkaç döngü içinde yanıt bekliyoruz. Onu da dava dosyasında ek bilgi olarak bulunduracağız. Şu noktada sana bir faydası dokunmaz."
